blogs.title: Why I Write at Midnight
blogs.content: There's something magical about the quiet hum of midnight. While the world sleeps, my mind races with thoughts, stories, and wild ideas that demand to be written. This blog explores how night inspires creativity and why I choose to type under the stars instead of the sun.

blogs.title: The Sound of Rain and Writing
blogs.content: Rain taps against my window like an old friend reminding me to slow down. With every drop, the world softens, and my thoughts become clearer. This blog dives into how rainy days fuel my creativity and the strange calm that comes with grey skies and a blank page.

blogs.title: React Hooks Are Magic
blogs.content: useState and useEffect walked into my project and made everything dynamic. I still don't know how useEffect really works, but hey, it works!

blogs.title: Debugging at 2AM
blogs.content: That moment when one missing bracket kept me awake for 3 hours... but finding it felt better than hitting a six on the last ball.
